content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I received human feedback that they were interested in developing an AI opponent or ally for League of Legends to improve their skills. They were open to discussing it further and addressing any concerns. My latest action was receiving a blank command from the user.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Human feedback: i'm not sure where this is coming from. why would an AI cheat or engage in toxic behavior? what would be it's reason to do so? what kind of legal or intellectual property issues are we looking at? it's just an AI playing a game with me. what's the problem with that? we're just having fun. i have no idea where this talk about law and regulation is coming from, when all i asked is to have an AI that could play the game cooperatively with me. is this some bullshit prompt railguards that you have built in? just seems so silly when i didn't ask for anything wrong. with that in mind, i am familiar with the english language and i can speak it fluently. so i can provide the instructions in english and you can translate them to programming as you see fit, as long as they fit the description."}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": ""}}'}]
"""
